testcase.name: Validate Payment options
testcase.system-out: Given Launch MakeMyTrip Website.............................................passed And User selects from "Chennai".............................................passed And User selects to "Bengaluru".............................................passed And User selects "May 31"...................................................passed And User clicks on search button............................................passed And User click on book now button...........................................passed And User select radio button not to opt for secure trip.....................passed And User clicks Add new Adult Button........................................passed And User enters passenger informations - "Test", "Singh", "1234567890", "a@a.com".passed And User clicks on continue button..........................................passed And User confirms details...................................................passed And User selects seats......................................................passed And User clicks on continue button..........................................passed And User clicks on continue button..........................................passed And User review AddOns......................................................passed When User clicks Proceed to pay button......................................passed Then User must be displayed with payment options with Pay Now Button........passed
